name: Sentinels of Singularity
description:
This project was created during our annual Akupara Game Jam. A team of 5 individuals created this project over 16 hours in December 2022.

Sentinels of Singularity is an action packed "One Stick Shooter." Basilisk, the AI, is reaching Singularity and threatens to end life as we know it. Each day our heroes fight Basilisk to prevent it from completing its research, reaching singularity, and (maybe) wiping humans from existence. 

Features: 

  • Single Stick Shooter - Focus on movement and positioning without the stress of aiming or inputting other complex controls. Zero in on what matters - conquering Basilisk.
  • Captivating Story - Save mankind from Basilisk, an ever-growing (and ever-threatening) AI that threatens to consume life as we all know it.
  • Varied enemy types - Never grow bored of your foes, while mowing down common foes you'll encounter specialty enemies that offer unique behaviors. 
  • Choose your weapon - Varied and customizable. Improve your strategy, flexibility, and prepare accordingly for your next round.
